bill.title: Water Carrier; Tariffs
bill.description: Authorizes the Public Utilities Commission to provide preferential water carrier service tariffs for ratepayers that engage in agricultural activities. (HB2644 CD1)

history.action: (H) Pending introduction.
(H) Introduced and Pass First Reading.
(H) Referred to CPC, FIN, referral sheet 8
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by CPC on Monday, 01-30-12 2:00PM in House conference room 325.

(H) The committees on CPC recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 12 Ayes: Herkes, Yamane, Brower, Coffman, Ito, Keith-Agaran, Luke, McKelvey, Souki, Tsuji, Ching, Marumoto; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Cabanilla, Carroll, Thielen.
(H) Reported from CPC (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 170-12) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.
(H) Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Takai excused (1).
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Monday, 02-27-12 4:00PM in House conference room 308.

(H) The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 16 Ayes: Representative(s) Oshiro, M. Lee, Choy, Cullen, Giugni, Har, Hashem, Ichiyama, Jordan, Kawakami, C. Lee, Morikawa, Tokioka, Yamashita, Marumoto, Riviere; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Ward.
(H) Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 947-12) as amended in HD 2, recommending passage on Third Reading.
(H) Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 03-06-12.
(H) Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 2 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
(S) Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 277).
(S) Passed First Reading.
(S) Referred to CPN, WAM.
(S) The committee(s) on CPN has scheduled a public hearing on 03-16-12 9:00AM in conference room 229.

(S) The committee(s) on CPN recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in CPN were as follows: 5 Aye(s): Senator(s) Baker, Galuteria, Nishihara, Solomon; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Slom ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Taniguchi, Green.
(S) Reported from CPN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2850) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to WAM.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to WAM.
(S) The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 03-29-12 9:00AM in conference room 211.

(S) The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in WAM were as follows: 14 Aye(s): Senator(s) Ige, Kidani, Chun Oakland, Dela Cruz, English, Espero, Fukunaga, Kahele, Kim, Kouchi, Ryan, Tokuda, Wakai; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Slom ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
(S) Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 3254) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading.
(S) One Day Notice 04-10-12.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Third Reading. Ayes, 25; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
(H) Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 648) in amended form (SD 1).
(H) House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).
(S) Received notice of disagreement (Hse. Com. No. 547).
(H) House conferees appointed: Herkes, Oshiro Co-Chairs; Hashem, Souki, Marumoto.
(S) Senate Conferees appointed: Baker, Chair; Ige, Co-Chair(s); Green, Solomon, Slom.
(H) Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 754).
(S) Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 612).
(H) Bill scheduled for Conference Committee Meeting on Wednesday, 04-18-12 3:10PM in conference room 016.
(H) Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Friday 04-20-12 10:00AM in conference room 016.
(H) Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Tuesday 04-24-12 10:00AM in conference room 016.
(H) Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Thursday 04-26-12 9:15AM in conference room 016.
(H) Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Thursday 04-26-12 4:40PM in conference room 016.
(H) Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Friday 04-27-12 9:40AM in conference room 016.

(H) The Conference Committee recommends that the measure be Passed, with Amendments. The votes were as follows: 4 Ayes: Representative(s) Herkes, Oshiro, Hashem, Marumoto; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Souki.

(S) The Conference committee recommends that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes of the Senate Conference Managers were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Baker, Ige, Green, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Solomon.
(H) Reported from Conference Committee (Conf Com. Rep. No. 60-12) as amended in (CD 1).
(H) Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 05-01-12.
(S) Reported from Conference Committee as amended CD 1 (Conf. Com. Rep. No. 60-12).
(S) 48 Hrs. Notice (as amended CD 1) 05-01-12.
(S) Passed Final Reading, as amended (CD 1). 25 Aye(s); Aye(s) with reservations: none . 0 No(es): none. 0 Excused: none.
(H) Passed Final Reading as amended in CD 1 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and none excused (0).
(H) Received notice of Final Reading (Sen. Com. No. 831).
(S) Received notice of passage on Final Reading in House (Hse. Com. No. 720).
(H) Transmitted to Governor.
